name: The Broken Bot
description:
A game created during a game jam about a defective robot that must traverse his way through the robot factory before he is destroyed. You are a "Broken Bot," and you get sent down to where all the rejected robots go. Do you have what it takes to escape from the Factory and gain your freedom?

W A S D to move

SPACE to jump

L SHIFT to dash

Didn't really have time to make the startup "lore," but pretty much you are a defected robot and get thrown down a mysterious tube.
